column1: '''Yulemath''' was the last month of the calendars of [[Bree]] and [[Eastfarthing]]
column2: corresponding to [[Foreyule]] in the [[Shire Calendar]]. It was the thirty days immediately preceding the holiday of [[Yule]]
column3: approximately corresponding to modern [[21 November]] through [[20 December]].<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
